verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Beautiful Lord,
Wonderful Saviour
I know for sure,
All of my days are
Held in your hands,
Crafted into your perfect plan
You gently call me
Into your presence
Guiding me by
Your Holy Spirit
Teach me dear Lord
To live all of my life
Through Your eyes
I'm captured by
Your holy calling
Set me apart,
I know you're drawing
Me to yourself
Lead me Lord I pray
Take me, Mold me,
Use me, fill me
I give my life to
The Potter's hand
Call me, guide me, lead me,
Walk beside me
I give my life to
the Potter's hand
